content.question: Answer the following question(s) in English unless the question specifically asks you to provide Latin words.In 3 to 4 complete sentences, identify one and only one thing that Aeneas has suffered in his quest, as described in lines 1-5 (Troiae...passus). Explain how the passage emphasizes the severity of this suffering. In your response you should do the following:Respond to the prompt with an interpretation.Include at least one specific Latin citation from the passage. Provide the Latin and/or cite line numbers and translate or accurately paraphrase the Latin. Refer to more than a single word in your reference.Explain how the Latin citation(s) support(s) your response.

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2

skill.text: 3.A: Develop an interpretation of a Latin text.
